column3:
私は、浜辺に流れ着くモノが好きで
色々見て回ってるの
何か見つけたら、私にも教えてね
column4:
I like things that wash up on the shore,
so I wander around looking at all sorts of them.
If you find something, be sure to tell me too.

column3: これ、どこで見つけたの！？
column4: Where did you find this!?

column3:
これはきっと、海の彼方から
流れ着いたんじゃないかな
column4:
This must have drifted here
from beyond the sea.

column3:
私たちと同じように
海の向こうでは知らない土地があって
色々な人たちが暮らしてるの
column4:
Just like us,
there are lands we don’t know on the other side of the sea,
and all kinds of people live there.

column3:
どうしてそんな事がわかるって？
わからないわよ
でも、そう考えた方が楽しいでしょ
column4:
How do I know something like that?
I don’t know.
But isn’t it more fun to think that way?

column3:
いつか、船で海の向こう側に
いってみたいわ
column4:
Someday, I want to travel by ship
to the other side of the sea.

column4: Where did you find this!?

column3:
何か見つけたら教えてね
でも、危険な魔物からは逃げた方がいいわよ！
column4:
If you find something, let me know.
But you should run away from dangerous monsters!

column3:
そうそう、共有しておきたい情報があるんだ
南の《青爪浜》には厄介な魔物がたむろしてるんだが
やつらがどうも、徐々に北上しているようでな
column4:
By the way, there’s some information I want to share.
There are troublesome monsters gathering at the southern Blueclaw Beach,
and it seems they’re gradually moving north.

column3:
こちら側まで来られると厄介だ
もしもそれらしい魔物の集団を見かけたら
駆除を頼む
column4:
It would be a problem if they came this far.
If you spot a group of monsters that fits the description,
I want you to eliminate them.

column3:
あんたに聞いてほしい情報があるんだ
南の《青爪浜》には強力な魔物がたむろしてるんだが
やつらがどうも、徐々に北上しているようでな
column4:
There’s information I want you to hear.
Powerful monsters are gathering at the southern Blueclaw Beach,
and they seem to be slowly advancing north.

column3:
かなり手強い連中だから
もしもこちら側まで来たら面倒だ
それらしい魔物の集団を見かけたら
退治を頼む
column4:
They’re a very tough bunch.
It would be a hassle if they came this way.
If you see a group of monsters like that,
I want you to defeat them.

column3: くれぐれも油断するなよ
column4: Don’t let your guard down.

column3:
あんたに伝えたかった情報があるんだ
南の《青爪浜》には危険な魔物がたむろしてるんだが
やつらがどうも、徐々に北上しているようでな
column4:
There’s information I wanted to pass on to you.
Dangerous monsters are gathering at the southern Blueclaw Beach,
and it looks like they’re steadily moving north.

column3:
並みの騎士じゃ歯が立たないだろう――
万一、こちら側までやつらが来たら村の危機だ！
もしもそれらしい魔物の集団を見かけたら
なんとか食い止めてほしいんだ
column4:
An ordinary knight wouldn’t stand a chance—
if they make it this far, the village will be in danger!
If you encounter a group of monsters like that,
I want you to stop them somehow.

column3:
俺じゃまず歯が立たないから
神殿に連絡しているんだが――
もし討伐に行くなら、準備は万端にな
column4:
I wouldn’t stand a chance against them myself,
so I’ve contacted the temple—
if you’re going to subjugate them, make sure you’re fully prepared.

column3:
おお、お疲れさま
例の魔物を駆除してくれたのか！
column4:
Oh, good work.
Did you take care of those monsters?

column3:
まぁ、すべてを根絶やしにはできないだろうが
ひとまず落着という所かな？
column4:
Well, you probably can’t wipe them out completely,
but things have settled down for now, I suppose.

column3:
おお、お疲れさま
例の魔物を退治してくれたのか！
ずいぶん頑張ってくれたみたいだな
column4:
Oh, good work.
So you took care of the monsters!
Looks like you really went all out.

column3:
まぁ、すべてを根絶やしにはできないだろうが
ひとまず脅威は去った、という所かな？
column4:
Well, you probably can’t eradicate them all,
but the immediate threat is gone, at least.

column3:
報酬金で今日はゆっくり休んでくれよ
また何かあったらよろしくな
column4:
Take it easy today with the reward money.
If anything else comes up, I’ll be counting on you.

column3:
おお、お疲れさま
例の魔物を退治してくれたのか！
さすがだな、あんな魔物を相手にできるとは
column4:
Oh, good work.
So you defeated those monsters!
Looks like you really put in the effort.

column3:
まぁ、すべてを根絶やしにはできないだろうが
当面の危機は去った、という所かな？
村の安泰もあんたのおかげだよ
column4:
Well, you can’t wipe them all out,
but the danger has passed for now.
The village’s safety is thanks to you.

column3:
報酬金には村から預かった分も入ってる
また何かあったらローテスのために
力を貸してくれよ
column4:
The reward includes the portion entrusted by the village.
If anything else happens,
lend your strength for Rotes again.

column3:
例の件はどうだ？
魔物が群れているのは南の《青爪浜》方面――
おそらくやつらのねぐらは
《廃村ルフロー》のあたりだろう
column4:
How did that matter turn out?
The monsters are gathering to the south, around Blueclaw Beach—
their nest is probably
somewhere near the Deserted Village of Ruflow.

column3:
覚者だな？
ちょうどいい、頼みたいことがある
ローテスから通報があって来たんだが――
別件で、この場から離れられなくなってな
column4:
You’re an Arisen, right?
Perfect timing — there’s something I want to ask you.
I came here after receiving a report from Rotes, but—
another matter has come up, and I can’t leave this place.

column3:
通報と言っても、大したことじゃない
ブリア海岸に、不審者が流れ着いたらしい
column4:
It’s nothing too serious,
but it seems a suspicious person washed ashore at Breya Coast.

column3:
どうも見たことのない格好で、
武装もしているとのことでな
手が空いているようなら、確認してきてほしい
column4:
Apparently they’re dressed in unfamiliar clothing
and are armed.
If you’re free, I’d like you to go check it out.

column3:
住民の安全を第一に――
万が一危険が及ぶようならば、排除も任せる
白竜に心臓を捧げた覚者なら、お手の物だろう
column4:
The residents’ safety comes first—
if there’s any danger, you’re authorized to eliminate the threat.
For an Arisen who offered their heart to the White Dragon,
it should be a simple task.

column3:
ブリア海岸に、不審者が流れ着いたという通報があった
どうも見たことのない格好で、武装もしているため
一部の住民が怖がっているそうでな
column4:
We received a report that a suspicious person washed ashore at Breya Coast.
They’re wearing unfamiliar attire and are armed,
and some of the residents are frightened.

column3:
手が空いているようなら、確認してきてほしい
万が一にも無いとは思うが――
住民に危険が及ぶようなら、排除も任せる
column4:
If you have time, I want you to investigate.
I don’t think it will come to that, but—
if the residents are in danger, you may deal with it as you see fit.

column3:
なんと――そんなことが
至急、救護員を派遣させよう
column4:
What—something like that happened?
We’ll dispatch medical personnel immediately.

column3:
しかし――これは想像以上に大事かもしれんな
サイクロプスに良く似た、巨大生物の話
そして、海を知らない謎の女
column4:
Still—this may be more serious than we imagined.
A report of a gigantic creature resembling a cyclops,
and a mysterious woman who doesn’t know the sea.

column3:
此度の協力、感謝する
あとの調査は白衛騎士団で引き受けよう
手間をかけてすまなかったな
column4:
Thank you for your cooperation this time.
The White Guard Knight Order will handle the remaining investigation.
Sorry to have troubled you.

column3:
しかし、次から次へと奇妙な事件ばかり――
このレスタニアは、一体どうなってしまうんだ？
column4:
But strange incidents just keep happening one after another—
what in the world is becoming of this Lestania?

column3:
うぅ――
ここは、一体
お前たちは？
column4:
Ugh—
where am I…
Who are you people?

column3:
こ、これは――
一体なんなんだ、ここは！？
column4:
Th-this is—
what in the world is this place!?

column3:
わたしは――確か、巨人と戦っていたら
川に足を滑らせ落ちてしまった、はず――
column4:
I was—if I remember right, I was fighting a giant,
then I slipped and fell into a river—at least, I think…

column3:
レスタニア、だと？
レスタニア区なんて、聞いたことがないが――
それに、こんなでかい川があるところなんて――
column4:
Lestania, you say?
I’ve never heard of a Lestania region—
and a place with a river this huge, either—

column3:
――待て
この、足音は、まさか
column4:
—Wait.
Those footsteps… don’t tell me—

column3:
――巨人だと！？
ここはまだ壁の外なのか！？
わたしはいいから、あんただけでも逃げてくれ
食われるぞ！
column4:
A giant!?
Is this still outside the walls!?
Forget about me—run, at least you should escape!
You’ll be eaten!

column3:
ゴホッ、ゴホッ――
あ、あんた――無事か？
column4:
cough, cough—
H-hey… are you alright?

column3:
そうか
それは、良かっ――
ゲホ、ゴホッ
column4:
I see…
That’s good to—
cough, cough

column3:
あぁ
母さん、ごめん――
column4:
Ah…
Mom, I’m sorry—

column3: ふう――やったか！？
column4: Phew—did we get it!?

column3: クソ、仲間を呼び寄せやがった！
column4: Damn it, it called for reinforcements!

column3: う、嘘だろ――！
column4: N-no way…!

column3:
へえ、よくここを見つけたね
さぞ強くて頼もしい覚者なんだろうね？
そうだ、きっとそうに違いない
column4:
Heh, you found this place pretty easily.
You must be a strong and reliable Arisen, huh?
Yes, I’m sure you are.

column3:
そんな頼もしいキミにお願いがあるんだ
この近くの《潮騒洞窟》って場所に
危険な魔物が住み着いたらしくてね
column4:
I have a favor to ask someone as dependable as you.
It seems dangerous monsters have taken up residence
in a place nearby called the Roaring Tide Cave.

column3:
近くの住民に泣きつかれてしまったよ
ご飯までご馳走に――――
――と、とにかく放っておけないと思うだろう？
column4:
The nearby residents begged me for help.
They even offered me meals and all—
—anyway, you can’t just ignore that, right?

column3:
聞いてみると、私では歯が立たない強さらしい
ね、頼むよ覚者くん！ 
そのたくましい腕で、軽ーく討伐してくれよ
column4:
From what I hear, they’re far too strong for me to handle.
So please, Arisen!
Use those sturdy arms of yours and take them out—easy as pie.

column3:
おいおい、本当に討伐してきたのかい？
信じられないよ――キミほどの実力者が、
なんだってこんな所でフラフラしていたのさ
column4:
Hey, hey, did you really go and defeat them?
I can’t believe it—someone with your level of skill,
why were you just wandering around a place like this?

column3:
ま、とにかくこれで住民も喜んでくれるはず――
キミにもお礼をしないとね
とっておきの希少品、気に入るといいな――
column4:
Well, anyway, the residents should be happy now—
and I ought to thank you as well.
I hope you like this special rare item I picked out.

column3:
怖気づいたのかい？ ――――まさかね
ヤツは《潮騒洞窟》にいるそうだよ
column4:
Did you get cold feet? ————nah, no way.
They say it’s in the Roaring Tide Cave.

column3:
私かい？ 私はもちろんここでお宝――
な、なんでもないよ
――――ほら、早く行きなよ
column4:
Me? I’m obviously staying here to look for treasure—
n-no, it’s nothing.
———come on, hurry up and go.

column3:
――あぁ、おまえか
少し手を貸してくれ
column4:
—Ah, it’s you.
Lend me a hand for a moment.

column3:
実は、倉庫を確認したところ
色々と備蓄が不足していることが分かってな
column4:
I checked the warehouse,
and it turns out we’re short on various supplies.

column3:
少々面倒をかけるが
補充が必要な物資を手に入れて欲しいんだ
column4:
It’s a bit of a hassle,
but I need you to procure the supplies we’re lacking.

column3:
――あぁ、おまえか
少し手を貸してくれ
column4:
—Ah, it’s you.
Lend me a hand for a bit.

column3:
オークとの戦いで、備蓄していた物資を
かなり使ってしまってな――
このままでは砦の維持が難しい
column4:
In the fight against the orcs,
we used up a large portion of our stockpiled supplies—
at this rate, maintaining the fort will be difficult.

column3:
少々面倒をかけるが
幾つかの物資を調達してきて欲しい
column4:
It’s a bit troublesome,
but I need you to acquire several supplies.

column3:
――あぁ、おまえか
丁度良いところに来てくれた
column4:
—Ah, it’s you.
You’ve come at just the right time.

column3:
北のオークどもの動きが不穏だという報せが入ってな
急ぎ防衛のため準備を進めているのだが
column4:
We’ve received reports that the orcs in the north are making suspicious moves,
and we’re rushing to prepare our defenses.

column3:
倉庫を調べたところ
物資が色々と不足していたことが分かった
オークどもと戦う以前の問題だ――
column4:
After checking the warehouse,
we found that we’re short on various supplies.
This is a problem even before we can fight the orcs—

column3:
そこで頼みたい
何とかこれらの物資を手に入れてきて欲しい
column4:
So here’s what I’m asking.
I want you to somehow acquire these supplies.

column3:
見事な手際だな――
おまえになら、これも頼めそうだ
column4:
Excellent work—
if it’s you, I think I can ask this of you as well.

column3:
ご苦労だった
助かるよ――
column4:
Good work.
That helps a lot—

column3: これで当面は備蓄の心配からは解放されたわけだ
column4: For the time being, this frees us from worrying about our stockpiles.

column3: これからも立ち寄った時は声をかけてくれ
column4: If you stop by again, be sure to say something.

column3:
ご苦労だった
ああ、助かるよ
column4:
Good work.
Ah, that really helps.

column3:
これで何とか不足していた物資の
補充ができた
礼を言う――
column4:
With this, we’ve managed to replenish
the supplies we were lacking.
You have my thanks—

column3:
これからも立ち寄った時は声をかけてくれ
仕事ならいっぱいあるぞ
column4:
If you stop by again, let me know.
There’s plenty of work to be done.

column3:
よくやってくれた
さすがだな――
他の連中にも見習わせたいぐらいだ
column4:
You did well.
As expected of you—
I’d like the others to learn from your example.

column3:
いっそ、このまま砦にとどまり
私のとなりで力を発揮してくれてもいいのだが――
まあ、レオがうるさいか
column4:
Honestly, you could just stay here at the fort
and put your strength to use at my side—but
Leo would probably complain.

column3:
おまえならいつでも歓迎する
また顔を見せてくれ
column4:
You’d be welcome here anytime.
Come by again.

column3:
てこずっているのか？
不慣れは理由にならないぞ？
column4:
Are you having trouble?
Inexperience isn’t an excuse, you know.

column3:
大変なんだよ
ヴァネッサ様への報告書が集まらない！
あと１枚なんだけど――
column4:
It’s a mess.
We can’t get all the reports for Lady Vanessa together!
We’re just missing one more, but—

column3:
誰かがまだ提出していないんだよな
なあ、あんた、回収頼むよ
column4:
Someone still hasn’t turned theirs in.
Hey, can you go collect it for me?

column3:
大変なんだよ
ヴァネッサ様への報告書が集まらない！
あと１枚なんだけど――
column4:
It’s a mess.
We can’t get all the reports for Lady Vanessa together!
We’re just missing one more, but—

column3:
誰かがまだ提出していないんだよな
なあ、あんた、回収頼むよ
column4:
Someone still hasn’t turned theirs in.
Hey, can you go collect it for me?

column3:
一応言っておくけど
魔物がうろついているから気をつけてな
column4:
Just so you know,
there are monsters roaming around, so be careful.

column3:
大変なんだよ
ヴァネッサ様への報告書が集まらない！
あと１枚なんだけど――
column4:
It’s a real problem.
We can’t get all the reports for Lady Vanessa together!
We’re just missing one more, but—

column3:
誰かがまだ提出していないんだよな
なあ、あんた、回収頼むよ
column4:
Someone still hasn’t turned theirs in.
Hey, I’m counting on you to collect it.

column3:
知っていると思うけど
このあたりは魔物がけっこう強いから
気をつけてな
column4:
You probably already know this,
but the monsters around here are pretty strong,
so be careful.

column3:
え？　なんですか？
あ、報告書でありますか！？
column4:
Huh? What is it?
Oh—are you here about the report!?

column3:
ホントですか！？
出していないのは
自分だけでありますか！？
column4:
Really!?
Am I the only one
who hasn’t submitted it!?

column3:
お願いです、自分、負傷していまして
報告書を持参できないのであります！
column4:
Please, I’m injured,
so I can’t bring the report myself!

column3:
これが自分の報告書です
担当者に渡して頂ければ幸いであります！
column4:
This is my report.
I would be grateful if you could deliver it to the person in charge!

column3:
おお――報告書がそろった！？
ありがとう――うん、ありがとう
column4:
Oh—did you gather all the reports!?
Thank you—yes, thank you.

column3:
それでさ――言いにくいんだけど
提出時間が過ぎていてさ――
きっと、無茶苦茶怒られるんだ――
column4:
And, uh—this is hard to say, but
the submission deadline has already passed—
I’m sure I’m going to get chewed out—

column3:
ここまで来たら、ついでだよな？
報告書をヴァネッサ様に届けてくれ！
column4:
Since you’ve come this far, might as well, right?
Please deliver the reports to Lady Vanessa!

column3:
ああ、報告書か――
ん？　なぜおまえが――
担当者はどうしたんだ？
column4:
Ah, the report—
huh? Why are you here—?
What happened to the assigned officer?

column3:
なんと――そんなことが！？
叱責を逃れようなどは笑止千万
この守備隊員にあるまじき行為！
column4:
What—something like that happened!?
Trying to avoid reprimand is utterly laughable—
such conduct is unbecoming of a guard!

column3:
委細、承知した
あとは自分で対処しておく
column4:
I understand the situation in detail.
I’ll handle the rest myself.

column3:
今回は迷惑をかけたな――
神殿の皆によろしく伝えてくれ
ご苦労だった
column4:
We caused you trouble this time—
give my regards to everyone at the temple.
Good work.

column3:
ああ、報告書か――
ん？　なぜおまえが――
担当者はどうしたんだ？
column4:
Ah, the reports—
Hm? Why are you the one here—
what happened to the officer in charge?

Train harder before we meet again.

I can’t afford to slack off anymore.

column3:

column4:
But an Arisen’s battle never ends.
You must keep honing your skills.
Once you’ve become an Arisen,
all we can do is keep slaying monsters.

column3:
どんな無茶苦茶な奴が現れようとだ
じゃあ、またな
column4:
No matter how insane an enemy shows up.
See you around.

Still can’t handle it with your current skills?

column3:

column3:

tch, should’ve handled it myself.

column4:

column3:

column4:

what!? You even defeated it!?

column3: すげえよ――あんた、すげえよ！
column4:
That’s incredible—
you’re amazing!

column3:
ん？　どうして？
怖じ気づいたのか？
まあ、無理する必要はないけどな
column4:

Well, there’s no need to force yourself.

column3: ああ、丁度良かった

column3:

大事な物を落としてしまって
column4:
While I was exploring a certain ruin,
I ended up losing something important.

column4:

I’m truly grateful from the bottom of my heart.
You really helped me—thank you!

column3:

もちろん、わたしも今から探しに行くところ
さあ、先に行って？
column4:

Of course I’m heading out to search too.
Go on ahead, will you?

column3:
どうかリズ様のため
よろしくお願いいたします
column4:
Please, for Lady Lise’s sake,
we humbly ask for your help.

column3:

ご無事で何よりでした
column4:
Thank you very much.
I’m glad to see you returned safely.

column3:

かつては白竜様が翼を休める
休息の神殿だったというが――はぁ
column4:
Have you heard of this ruin?
They say it was once a resting temple
where the White Dragon would rest its wings—sigh.

column3:

No matter how many times we defeat or drive them off,
they just come back and settle in again.

column3:

どう猛、凶暴、凶悪で数も多い
それでも良ければ――頼むよ
column4:
To be blunt, the monsters are very strong.
They’re savage, violent, vicious, and numerous.
If you’re still willing—please help us.

column3:
ありがとう――ご苦労だったな
また魔物が増えたらよろしく頼むよ
column4:
Thank you—good work.
If the monsters increase again, I’ll be counting on you.

column3:

column4:

how long this endless back-and-forth will continue—

column3:

column4:

If more monsters appear, I’ll rely on you again.

column3:

column4:
But really,
how long will this cat-and-mouse game go on—

column3:

愚痴を聞かせちゃ申し訳ない
すまなかった
column4:
No, no—you fought hard for us,
and I shouldn’t burden you with my complaints.
My apologies.

column3:
なんと――倒してくれたのか！？
あんた、凄い腕前だな！
column4:
What—did you defeat them!?
You’ve got incredible skill!

column3:
奴ら、またここに集まるだろうが
あんたがいてくれれば安心だ
column4:
They’ll probably gather here again,
but as long as you’re around, I feel at ease.

column3: その時はよろしく頼むよ！

column3:
無理はして欲しくないが――

large numbers of monster groups have appeared
in various locations north of the fort.

dealing with them will be extremely difficult—
so before that happens, we must strike first
and eliminate them one by one.

残念ながら被害が増すばかりだ
column4:

but unfortunately the damage has only continued to grow.

神殿すら蹂躙されかねない
よって、奴らが大挙して向かってくる前に

and even the temple could be trampled.

we have no choice but to strike first and defeat them one by one!

column3: ありがとう――助かった
column4: Thank you—this was a great help.

column3: 無事だったか！
column4: You made it back safely!

column3:
おまえの実力は知っているが
今回ばかりは分が悪いと思っていた
しかし、見くびっていたようだ
column4:
I knew of your ability,
but this time I thought the odds were against you.
It seems I underestimated you.

column3:
すまなかった――そして、ありがとう
おまえを見つけたレオがうらやましいよ
column4:
My apologies—and thank you.
I’m envious of Leo for having found you.

column3: 良くぞ生きて戻ってきてくれた――
column4: You did well to survive and return—

column3:
報告は聞いている――
砦と神殿の窮地を救ってくれて感謝する
column4:
I’ve heard the report—
thank you for saving the fort and the temple in their hour of need.

column3:

column4:
I knew of your strength,
but I thought this time the odds were poor.
It seems I misjudged you.

column3:

—I see…
so that kind of group had gathered.

It may only be a temporary fix,
but it’s better than doing nothing.
Thank you for lending your strength.

—I see…
to think so many of them had gathered.

column4:

We can’t let our guard down yet, but for now, that’s good.
Thank you for your help.

column3:
おお戻ったか

どうなっていた？
column4:
Oh, you’re back!
I was waiting—are you alright!?
What was the situation?

column3:
――なんと！
思っていた以上に現地は

column4:
—What!?
Things on site were in far worse shape
than we imagined—

column3:
だがそれにしても、そのような事態をも
収めてしまうとは恐れ入るよ
力を貸してくれて、本当に感謝する
column4:
Even so, to have brought such a situation under control—
I’m truly impressed.
Thank you sincerely for lending your strength.

column3:
もし手におえない状況なら
手を出さずに戻ってくることだ
column4:
If the situation is beyond your ability,
don’t engage—just come back.

column3: 今、無理をする必要は無いぞ
column4: There’s no need to push yourself right now.

column3:

こんな所に来るとは物好きだな
column4:
It’s you.

column4:
If you’re looking for oddballs, there are plenty ahead.

column3:

Let’s have them remain quietly
in the graveyard.

column4:

column4:

One wrong move, and we’ll end up
living in the catacombs permanently.

I’d prefer to fight in the daylight.

I suppose it’s enough that we kept them
from reaching the surface.

there’s no reason for them
to go and live inside graves.

at this rate, we may have to seal it off entirely.

column4:

Head out now.

よくやってくれた！
手間を取らせたな
column4:
Well done!
Sorry for the trouble.

column3:
これからも頼らせてもらいたい
よろしくお願いする
column4:
I’d like to keep relying on you from here on.
I’m counting on you.

column3:

おかげで悩みの種が一つ減ったよ
column4:
You did great!!
Thanks to you, one of my worries is gone.

column3:
これからも頼らせてもらいたい
よろしくお願いする

I’d like to keep relying on you from here on.

column3:

同じ覚者として誇りに思う

As a fellow Arisen, I’m proud of you.

column3:

column4:

If that communication route became unusable,
it would be a serious inconvenience.

column3:
これからも頼らせてもらいたい
よろしくお願いする
column4:
I’d like to keep relying on you from here on.
I’m counting on you.

column3:
今そちらには、我々の手は割けない
どうか頼んだぞ
column4:
We don’t have the manpower to send over there right now.
Please, I’m counting on you.

column4: Ah—what the hell are you lot!?

column3:
おれは、おれは――
うん？　なんだ、頭がハッキリしないがまぁいい――
column4:
I—I am—
Huh? What’s this… my head’s not clear, but whatever—

column3: やることは分かっているからなっ！
column4: I know exactly what I need to do!

column3: まずは、軽くおマイらをみな殺しよ！
column4: First, I’ll casually slaughter every last one of you!

column3:
な、なんだとォ――！？
おれは不死身だろうにッ――！
column4:
W-what did you say!?
I’m supposed to be immortal—!

column3:
ああッ！　ちょうどいいところに来てくれた！
助かったぁ――
column4:
Ah! You came at just the right time!
You saved me—

実は、君くらいにしか相談できない事態でさ
《第三のアーク》で怪しい動きがあると神殿から
調査依頼が入ったんだけど、派遣された隊士が
戻ってこないんだよ！

To be honest, this is a situation I can only consult someone like you about.
The temple sent a request saying there’s suspicious activity
at the Third Ark, but the soldiers who were dispatched
haven’t come back!

column4:

and if you find any suspicious monsters, I’d like you to defeat them.

ああ！　嫌な予感しかしないからさ
column4:
If I went myself, I’m sure—
ah! I’ve got nothing but bad feelings about it.

column3:
こんなこと頼めるのは君くらいなんだ
本当頼むよ
column4:
You’re the only one I can ask to do this.

column4:
Go investigate the suspicious presence at the Third Ark.
You should be able to get a ship from the White Dragon Temple’s harbor.

column3:

まずはありがとう、そんな恐ろしい魔物を
退治してくれたとはね
column4:
Ah… I see—the investigation team was already beyond saving…
First of all, thank you.
To think you defeated such a terrifying monster.

column3:
――で、続けていうのも心苦しいんだけどさ
実は調べてほしいのはもうひとつあって――
column4:
—and I hate to pile this on you right after that, but
there’s actually one more thing I’d like you to investigate—

column3:

今回のようになるに決まってる！
column4:

We were just about to assemble the next investigation team, but
it’s bound to turn out just like last time!

column3:
だからさ、頼むよ
もう一度調査に君の力を貸してほしいんだ
column4:
So please—
I want you to lend your strength to another investigation.

column4: The next place I want you to investigate is the Mergoda Ward.

column3:
ちょうど次の調査隊を組む所だったんだけど
今回のようになるに決まってる！
だから、もう一度君の力を貸してほしいんだ
column4:
We were just about to form the next investigation team, but
it’s guaranteed to end up like this again!
So I want you to lend your strength once more.

column3:
え！　《メルゴダ護政区》にいたのは
あのズールだって！？
column4:
What!? The one in the Mergoda Ward
was that Zuhl!?

column3:
それは、君に行ってもらって正解だったよ
俺達じゃむざむざ殺されにいくようなものだったな
column4:
Sending you was absolutely the right call.
If it had been us, we’d have been walking straight to our deaths.

column3:
とにかく、ありがとう！
頼りっぱなしにならないよう、俺たちも鍛えないとな
column4:
Anyway, thank you!
We can’t keep relying on you forever—we need to train ourselves too.

column3:
やあ、観光かい？
――冗談さ、そんなはずないよね
キミも神殿のお宝を求めてきたんだろう
column4:
Hey there, sightseeing?
—Just kidding, of course not.
You came here for the temple’s treasures too, right?

column3:
神殿とは名ばかりで、魔物の巣窟になっていたとはね
 ――という訳でキミ！
トレジャーハンター同士、協力しようじゃないか
column4:
A temple in name only—it’s turned into a den of monsters.
—So then, my friend!
As fellow treasure hunters, why don’t we work together?

column3:
どうやらキミは腕が立ちそうだから――
うん、《浄水区》の魔物討伐をお願いしていいかな？
あそこから魔物が湧き出しているみたいだから
column4:
You look pretty capable—
yeah, could I ask you to handle the monster extermination
in the Purification District?
It seems monsters are pouring out from there.

column3:
キミが魔物を抑えてくれている間、
私はお宝が無いか辺りを探ってみるよ
もちろん報酬は弾む――悪くない契約だろう？
column4:
While you keep the monsters in check,
I’ll look around for any treasure.
Of course, I’ll pay well—not a bad deal, right?

column3:
やってきてくれたのか！
私もなんとか、神殿内を探ることができたよ
残念だけどガラクタばかりさ
column4:
You came through!
I managed to search inside the temple myself too.
Sadly, it was nothing but junk.

column3:
もう盗賊にあらかた漁られてしまったようだ
とはいえ、キミにはお礼をしないとね
ありがとう――
column4:
Looks like thieves already looted most of it.
Still, I owe you my thanks.
Thank you—

column3:
なに、トレジャーハンターではなく覚者だって？
へぇ――
だとしても、人助けが仕事なんだろう？
《浄水区》へ行って、私を助けてくれ
column4:
What, you’re not a treasure hunter but an Arisen?
Huh—
even so, helping people is your job, right?
Go to the Purification District and help me.

column3:
そこのあなた――
覚者と見ましたが――
ああ、やはりそうでしたか
column4:
You there—
I took you for an Arisen—
ah, so I was right.

column3:
はい、いかにもわたしは魔物です
でも、争いはもうたくさん――
column4:
Yes, I am indeed a monster.
But I’ve had enough of fighting—

column3:
と言いますのも、まもなく
子供が生まれるのです
column4:
You see, before long,
my child will be born.

column3:
ところが巣の材料が
まったく手に入らなくて――
column4:
However, I can’t obtain
any materials for the nest—

column3:
どうでしょう――
材料を探していただけませんか？
column4:
So please—
would you help me find the materials?

would you help me look for the materials?

column3:
それなりに大変なことなので
心苦しいのですが――
column4:
It’s quite a difficult request,
and I feel terrible asking—

column3:

column4:

would you help me find the materials?

材料の入手は大変ですし
邪魔をする魔物も多いでしょう
column4:
Obtaining the materials will be difficult,
and there will likely be many monsters getting in the way.

column3:
この上なく大変だとは思いますが
どうかお引き受けください
column4:
I know this will be extremely difficult,
but please, I beg you to accept.

column3:
すっかりお世話になってしまいましたね
ありがとうございます
column4:
You’ve taken such good care of me.
Thank you very much.

column3:
生まれてくる子には、あなたにだけは
襲いかかることのないように
言い聞かせますね
column4:
I’ll make sure to tell my unborn child
never to attack you,
no matter what.

column3:

column4:

Thank you very much.

あなたにだけは

column4:
To my unborn child,
I’ll make sure
they never attack you—

column3:
孫の代にも申し伝えるように
言い聞かせておきますからね
column4:
I’ll make sure the message is passed down
even to my grandchildren.

column4:

Thank you very much.

column4:

I’ll make sure
they never attack you—

column3:
七代先の子孫にまで申し伝えるように
言い聞かせておきますからね
column4:
I’ll make sure it’s passed down
even to descendants seven generations from now.

column3:
材料は見つかりませんか？
わたしもかなり探したのですが――
column4:
Have you found the materials?
I’ve searched quite a bit myself, but—

column3:
おお――ありがとうございます！
まずはお礼を申し上げます
column4:
Oh—thank you very much!
First of all, please accept my gratitude.

column3:
そして――申し訳ありませんが
もう一度――
column4:
And—I'm terribly sorry, but
one more time—

column3:
本当にありがとうございます！
まずはお礼を申し上げます
column4:
Thank you so very much!
First of all, please accept my thanks.

column3:
そして――次で最後になります
どうぞよろしくお願いします
column4:
And—this will be the last time.
Please, I beg you.

column3:
助けてください！
あの魔物、まったく話が通じないんです！
倒してください！
column4:
Help me!
That monster won’t listen to a word I say!
Please, defeat it!

column3:
おお、覚者よ
良いところに来た
column4:
Oh, Arisen.
You’ve come at just the right time.

column3:
実は珍しい食材があると聞いて
ここまで来たのだが
この先、何やら魔物の気配がする
column4:
I heard there was a rare ingredient here,
so I came all this way,
but there’s a troubling monster presence ahead.

column3:
どうだ、貴殿――
わたしに褒められたくはないか？
column4:
Well then, sir—
would you not like to earn my praise?

column3:

良いところに来た
column4:
Oh, Arisen.
You’ve arrived at a fine moment.

column3:

column4:
Well then, sir—
would you care to be praised by me?

column3:
多少は苦労するだろうが
謝礼はその分上乗せするぞ
column4:
It will take some effort,
but I’ll increase the reward accordingly.

column4:

would you like my praise?

column3:

立派な葬式と墓を用意するぞ
column4:
Even if you were to lose your life,
I would prepare a fine funeral and grave for you.

column3:
ほう、これか
ふむ――まあ、こんなものか
column4:
Oh? This is it?
Hmm—well, I suppose this will do.

column3:
よし、ご苦労だったな
謝礼は後で送らせよう
column4:
Alright, good work.
I’ll send the reward later.

column3:

column4:

Hmm—this is quite something—

column3:

column4:
Alright, good work.
I’ll send the reward later.

column3:
ほう、これか
ふむ――これは素晴らしい――
おお――ヨダレが出るわ
column4:
Oh? This is it?
Hmm—this is splendid—
oh—my mouth is watering.

column3:
よし、ご苦労だったな
この功績に見合う謝礼を後で送らせよう
column4:
Excellent work.
I’ll send a reward worthy of this achievement later.

column3:
まだかな？
こんなところに長居はしたくないのだが
column4:
Is it not done yet?
I’d rather not linger in a place like this.

column3:
おや？　そこいくあなたは覚者かな
少し話を聞いてもらえないだろうか
column4:
Oh? You there—are you an Arisen?
Might I ask you to hear me out for a moment?

column3:
この古い古い城の中には、当然だが
古い時代のものが沢山あってね――
column4:
Inside this very old castle, as you’d expect,
there are many artifacts from ancient times—

column3:
それを、適当で結構なんだが
見つくろってここに持ってきてくれないか？
column4:
It doesn’t have to be anything specific,
but could you select some and bring them back here?

column3:
もちろん礼はするさ
ああ、売り払ったりはしないよ
純粋に、研究が目的なんだ
column4:
Of course I’ll reward you.
Ah, I won’t sell them off—
this is purely for research purposes.

column3:
おや？　そこいくあなたは覚者かな
少し話を聞いてもらえないだろうか
column4:
Oh? You there—are you an Arisen?
Could you spare a moment to listen?

column3:
この古い古い城の中には、当然だが

there are many relics from ancient times—

column3:
それを、目についただけかき集めて
ここに持ってきてくれないか？
column4:
Could you gather whatever catches your eye
and bring it back here?

column3:
もちろん中には魔物がいるから
十分に注意するんだ
史料にもしものことがあったら大変だからね
column4:
There are monsters inside, of course,
so be very careful.
It would be terrible if anything happened to the materials.

column3:

少し話を聞いてもらえないだろうか

May I ask for a moment of your time?

column3:

column4:
Inside this very old castle, as you’d expect,
there are many items from ancient times—

column3:
それを、片っ端から手当たり次第
ここに持ってきてくれないか？
column4:
Could you bring back everything you find,
one after another?

column3:
中は魔物の巣窟らしいから
しっかりと準備をしてから行ってくれ
それと、史料が血で汚れないよう気をつけてくれよ
column4:
It seems the inside is a den of monsters,
so make sure you’re well prepared before going.
And please be careful not to stain the materials with blood.

column3:
ほう――ほうほう――
良い物が手に入った
これはなかなかだ！
column4:
Oh—oh ho—
I’ve obtained something good.
This is quite impressive!

column3:
おっと――これはなかなか――
うん、貴重な史料が手に入った
頭を下げたかいがあったというものだね
column4:
Oh—this is quite something—
Yes, I’ve acquired some valuable documents.
It was worth bowing my head for this.

column3:
おお！　これは！？　素晴らしい資料だ！
こんなものが残っていたとは！
column4:
Oh! What’s this!? These are magnificent records!
To think something like this still remained!

column3:
――こうしてはいられない！
さっそく研究の続きに戻らなければ――！
column4:
—I can’t stand around like this!
I must return to my research at once—!

column3:
いやぁ――成果が楽しみだよ
ほら、早く城の中へ行ってくれ
column4:
Ah—I can’t wait to see the results.
Now then, hurry and head back into the castle.

column3:
――あんた、白竜神殿の覚者だろ？
ここには何で来たの？　任務？
column4:
—Hey, you’re an Arisen of the White Dragon Temple, right?
What brought you here? A mission?

column3:
――と、知りつつ誘ってみるんだけどさ
城内の魔物、退治してくれない？
column4:
—I know the answer already, but I’ll ask anyway.
Could you deal with the monsters inside the castle?

column3:
ここ、もうちょい探検したいんだけど
魔物が強すぎてまいってたのよ
――頼むわ
column4:
I want to explore a bit more here,
but the monsters are way too strong—I was at my limit.
—I’m begging you.

but the monsters are too strong—I couldn’t handle it.
—I’m counting on you.

column3:
まあ、手こずるかも知れないけど
何とかできるでしょ？　覚者だし
column4:
Well, you might struggle a bit,
but you can handle it, right? You are an Arisen after all.

宝や――建物自体だって貴重
column4:
Inside, there are treasures preserved since ancient times—
even the building itself is valuable.

column3:
ほら、さ
そういうのが魔物に壊されるのって
だるいでしょ、なんか
column4:
You know,
having things like that destroyed by monsters
is just… exhausting, right?

column3:
ま、魔物が強すぎるからさ
正直あんたでも辛いかも――だけど
column4:
Well, the monsters are really strong, so
honestly, even you might have a hard time—but still.

column3: へぇ、やるじゃん！
column4: Heh, not bad at all!

column3: もし魔物が増えたら、その時はまた頼むわ
column4: If more monsters show up, I’ll ask you again.

column3:
なに、もう倒したの？
さすが覚者！　やるじゃん
column4:
What, you already defeated them?
As expected of an Arisen! Nice work!

column3:
ごめんごめん
正直みくびってたわ
もっと時間かかると思ってたわ
column4:
Sorry, sorry.
Honestly, I underestimated you.
I thought it would take much longer.

column3: もし魔物が増えたら、その時はまた頼むわ
column4: If more monsters appear, I’ll ask you again.

column3:
えっ！　もう倒したって、それ本気？
うっそ信じらんない――
column4:
Huh!? You already beat them—seriously?
No way, I can’t believe it—

column3:
覚者ってほんとに強いんじゃん！
もっとだるいかと思ってたわ
column4:
Arisen really are strong!
I thought this would be way more of a pain.

column3:
ありがとね、あんたすごいよ
もし魔物が増えたら、また頼むわ
column4:
Thanks—you’re amazing.
If more monsters show up, I’ll ask you again.

column3:
あ、やっぱ無理？
やめてもいいよ
column4:
Ah, is it too much after all?
You can quit if you want.

column3:
おお、貴殿は――
もしや、時間はあるか？
ならば、手を貸してほしい
column4:
Oh, sir—
might you have some time?
If so, I would like your assistance.

column3:
実はこの渓谷には騎士団の所有物が
残されているのだ
column4:
In fact, there are Knight Order possessions
left behind in this valley.

column3:
どれも古いものだが
このまま捨て置くのは忍びない
よって、回収の手伝いをしてもらいたいのだ
column4:
They are all old, but
I cannot bear to leave them abandoned.
Thus, I would like your help recovering them.

column3:
北西に行くと、古い建物がある
貴殿はその中の物を頼む
それらしい物があれば持ち帰ってくれ
column4:
To the northwest, there is an old building.
I ask that you handle what’s inside.
If you find anything that seems relevant, bring it back.

column3:
わたしは建物の外を探して回る
魔物が多いはずだからな
では、あとで落ち合おう
column4:
I will search around outside the building.
There should be many monsters.
We will meet up later.

no, it’s hard to say.
You should assume they are fairly strong.

かなり強いと考えた方がいいかもしれない
column4:

no, it’s hard to say.
